alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 04 at 5:45PM CDT until June 05 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LINCOLN COUNTY... At 544 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Brady to 8 miles south of Maxwell, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Brady, Maxwell, Jeffrey Canyon State Wildlife Management Area and Cottonwood Canyon State Wildlife Management Area. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 188 and 204. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
